short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy to clipboard and paste to other devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ClipSynk is an innovative solution that bridges the gap between your devices, allowing you to seamlessly synchronize your clipboard content across multiple platforms. With ClipSynk, copying text, links, and snippets on one device is no longer isolated â€“ they become accessible to paste on any other connected device, including Chrome extensions.

Effortless clipboard sharing is at the heart of ClipSynk. Imagine copying an address on your computer and effortlessly pasting it on your smartphone, or copying an important code snippet on your tablet and pasting it directly into your code editor. Whether you're working on a project, sharing information, or simply streamlining your workflow, ClipSynk ensures that your clipboard is in sync, making your data available wherever you need it.
